column2: Badgermole Throne Succession is a special elective succession type that Earth kingdom uses. Ruler, Councilors, Ruler Consorts, Ruler Relatives, Commanders and Strong Vassals are Electors. Ruler has 10 votes, Relatives 4 votes, Commanders 6 ,Councilors 8, Powerful vassals 6. Only Former ruling dynasty members, Current ruling dynasty members, Claimants and Bloodline Holders are considered valid candidates.
